blog.name: lazydoodlesandfanfic
blog.title: ~Lazy Doodles and Fanfic~
blog.description: *REQUESTS ARE CLOSED * *NO SMUT* Welcome! I answer any and all questions, and here's the rules for requesting: https://lazydoodlesandfanfic.tumblr.com/post/169265737568/rules

title: Sisterly Assistance (Bucky X Male!Reader)
body:
Characters: Bucky X Male!Reader, Shuri X Brother!Reader

Universe: Marvel, Avengers, Black Panther

Warnings: None I think?

Request: Can I request a Bucky x T’Chala’s!Brother!Reader where Reader is older than Shuri but younger than T’Chala… He was taking care of Bucky with Shuri, and developed a crush on the White Wolf… He decides to tell Shuri about it and she plays match maker with them, because she knows that Bucky likes her brother, too…

“Get out.” Shuri ordered, not even looking up from her work, causing you to raise your arms, and look at your older brother with a ‘are you kidding me’ look. T’Challa tried to hide his smirk, seeing how childish the two of you still were.

“Shuri come on, it’s was a week-“

“You set fire to my blueprints.”

“Maybe you should make them with Vibranium as well…” You grumbled.

“Shuri, Y/N, you two better not be bickering again.” You heard your mother’s voice coming from the top of the stairs, getting a small chuckle from T’Challa. “T’Challa, you’re not helping.”

“Alright. Shuri, Y/N, I need to do a meeting, promise not to kill each other until I get back?” T’Challa excused, getting a huff from you both, and he simply rolled his eyes and left, knowing that was a yes. He still couldn’t believe that now he was King he still had to sort out his two little sibling’s squabbles.

When you knew both had left, you slid beside Shuri, resting your chin on your hand. “So, what is it you want to talk to me about?” Shuri asked, dropping the act. It was all an act- something everyone was in on, including your mother, just to annoy your big brother. It was a sort of game to see how long it would take him to realise you were both actually as thick as thieves and you were targeting him. So far, it had been over 12 years, since you started when Shuri was only 4 when you explained your plan to her, you being only a few years older.

“How do you tell a boy you like him?” You asked.

“What?” She asked, dropping her things to look at you. “I don’t know- I’m 16! Mother, T’Challa and you would all kill him if I had a boyfriend!” She reminded, making you nod, realising she was right. “Wait- boyfriend? Do you like someone? Who?” She quickly pieced together, getting in your face.

“Yes! Keep your voice down- you know how Okoye likes to tell T’Challa about what we say and we don’t want him finding out.” You hushed her, but she still got in your face. You took a deep breath. “It’s Bucky?”

“Sergeant Barnes?”

“Yes, Bucky.” You corrected, seeing her jaw drop, before she was up, giggling and clearly plotting as she paced. “Are you going to help me or blackmail me?” You asked, starting to regret telling your troublemaker of a little sister.

“Of course I’m going to help you! It’s so perfect!” She exclaimed.

“Okay, what do you have in mind?” You asked getting up now to stop her pacing.

“Easy- tell him.” She said, now causing your jaw to drop.

“I can’t do that!” You whisper yelled at her, but she only grinned, taking your arm, and pulling you with her up the stairs, you telling her to stop but not resisting, and the Dora Milaje guarding the hallways only stepped out of her way. She dragged you out the building through the fields and pathways, and you knew exactly where she was taking you. “Shuri I swear to- Hi Bucky!” You quickly changed demeanor when you saw the one armed man who emerged at the sounds of people approaching and you’re begging. His demeanor also changed, a grin covering his face.

“Hi Y/N… Hi Shuri, what brings you here?” He asked, Shuri pulled you to her side before shoving you forward.

“My brother needs to speak with you.” Shuri said before promptly turning and practically running away. You turned, cursing her out as several things as well as a traitor in your native tongue before turning back to Bucky, who was trying to hold back a laugh.

“She taught you some Xhosa, I’m guessing?” You asked, getting a chuckle and a nod from him. You swore you were going to kill her.

“What is it you’d like to talk about?” Bucky asked, and you took a deep breath.

Shuri wasn’t far away, hiding behind a rock, peeking over and watching the whole thing. “May I ask what you’re doing?” A voice asked, coming from behind her to the side of her. Shuri peeked, seeing Okoye, now also hiding behind the rock with her. She grinned.

“Playing matchmaker. Y/N likes Barnes and he likes him as well.” She explained to her, getting a giggle from the warrior. Both watched on as you both interacted, eventually confessing, and you both heard Shuri cheering as you ended up kissing.

Hope you like it! If you have any questions, please send them in!

*Not my gif

TAGS: @imbuckypositive @ari-maximoff @abbybills22 @waywardemo @httpmcrvel @mutantjediavenger @theoraekensnotsosecretlover @gayasfridge @courtneychicken  @graysonmalfoy @bellero @captain-peanut-at-your-service @likiyoshi-lijie @aesthetjic @originalpottervengerlock @supernatural-pan @esoltis280 @lena-stan-xavier @lady-of-lies @sebstanismylife

blog.name: sarcastictonystark
blog.title: Directing Science Disneyland
blog.description: You have reached the tumblr of Tony Stark. After making Banner get a blog here I finally gave in and made a public one myself. Ask me things or just enjoy the show, choice is yours. I check the tag "sarcastictonystark" and you can @tag me Not currently accepting M!As Currently accepting compliments None of the images are mine, just the words between them. Discord Join Link Links for mobile users: FAQ • Headcanons • Just the asks • Ko-fi

summary: What irritates me most about Captain America: Civil War is that I can’t read like half the fanfics written for the MCU because...
body: What irritates me most about Captain America: Civil War is that I can’t read like half the fanfics written for the MCU because they contain some form or other of character bashing. The only MCU character who deserves bashing is Thaddeus Ross.

reblog.comment: What irritates me most about Captain America: Civil War is that I can’t read like half the fanfics written for the MCU because they contain some form or other of character bashing. The only MCU character who deserves bashing is Thaddeus Ross.

body:
Thor would punch the TV

You guys know that one video wear its a car going down the road and then you get jumpscared, Or the scary maze game, or those gifs where its like “when you see it”.

Those basically. I feel like Peter and Shuri would play a prank on some of the Avengers, specifically Steve or Thor, and have them just watch or play these. They would be like, “I dont understand the point of th-HOLY SHIT”

summary:
I can picture the Russo brothers like:
“Hey, I bet you anything that if we post a random set pic and hint that there’s something...
body:
I can picture the Russo brothers like:

“Hey, I bet you anything that if we post a random set pic and hint that there’s something in it fans will go nuts”

And then hours later going through all that crazy shit and laughing their asses off:

“See?! Told you!”

reblog.comment:

summary: West Coast Avengers To Appear On Jimmy Kimmel Live
title: West Coast Avengers To Appear On Jimmy Kimmel Live
body:
West Coast Avengers To Appear On Jimmy Kimmel Live

Back in the day Marvel Super Heroes would pop up on Saturday Night Live and David Letterman on the pages of a comic book and now The House Of Ideas announces another treat like that for today’s readers when the West Coast Avengers appear onp the Jimmy Kimmel Live talk show. Check out the variant cover to West Coast Avengers #4 by David Nakayama.

The “Kimmel” appearance will put team leader Kate…
